sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
        <v-row>
            <!-- First Block -->
            <v-col cols="12" sm="6">
                <v-card>
                    <v-img :src="p2" height="250px">
                        <v-card-title class="white--text">spring/summer</v-card-title>
                        <v-card-subtitle class="white--text">
                            These are the best fits for the summer season
                        </v-card-subtitle>
                        <v-card-actions>
                            <v-btn color="white" outlined>Learn More</v-btn>
                        </v-card-actions>
                    </v-img>
                </v-card>
            </v-col>

            <!-- Second Block -->
            <v-col cols="12" sm="6">
                <v-card>
                    <v-img :src="p2" height="250px">
                        <v-card-title class="white--text">winter</v-card-title>
                        <v-card-subtitle class="white--text">
                            The new warm and cozy winter collection
                        </v-card-subtitle>
                        <v-card-actions>
                            <v-btn color="white" outlined>Collections</v-btn>
                        </v-card-actions>
                    </v-img>
                </v-card>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>

        <v-row>
            <!-- Third Block -->
            <v-col cols="12" sm="4">
                <v-card>
                    <v-img :src="p3" height="250px">
                        <v-card-title class="white--text">spring/summer</v-card-title>
                        <v-card-subtitle class="white--text">
                            These are the best fits for the summer season
                        </v-card-subtitle>
                    </v-img>
                </v-card>
            </v-col>

            <!-- Fourth Block -->
            <v-col cols="12" sm="4">
                <v-card>
                    <v-img src="path-to-your-image4.jpg" height="250px">
                        <v-card-title class="white--text">spring/summer</v-card-title>
                        <v-card-subtitle class="white--text">
                            These are the best fits for the summer season
                        </v-card-subtitle>
                    </v-img>
                </v-card>
            </v-col>

            <!-- Fifth Block -->
            <v-col cols="12" sm="4">
                <v-card>
                    <v-img :src="p5" height="250px">
                        <v-card-title class="white--text">spring/summer</v-card-title>
                        <v-card-subtitle class="white--text">
                            These are the best fits for the summer season
                        </v-card-subtitle>
                    </v-img>
                </v-card>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import p1 from "../assets/Home/p1.jpg";
import p2 from "../assets/Home/p2.jpg";
import p3 from "../assets/Home/p3.jpg";
import p4 from "../assets/Home/p4.jpg";
import p5 from "../assets/Home/p5.jpg";
export default {
    name: 'ImageGrid',
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-card-title {
    bottom: 16px;
    left: 16px;
    position: absolute;
}

.v-card-subtitle {
    bottom: 8px;
    left: 16px;
    position: absolute;
}

.v-card-actions {
    bottom: 16px;
    right: 16px;
    position: absolute;
}
</style>
